presentation.subtitle: and I build things for the Web.
presentation.description: I am a software developer, I specialize in the use of javascript, implementing technologies such as react and angular. What motivated me to be a developer is being able to provide technological solutions to problems of our current and future society, helping millions of people in their lives.

experience.essenceGlitch: Works with a unique and forceful visual language, capable of delighting fans of graphic arts: drawing, illustration, graphic design, character design, etc., and that are also supported by a well-told story.
experience.essenceSelego: Classic and contemporary independent film and content with a special focus on diversity, inclusion and gender perspective, as well as political engagement and experimental narratives.
experience.essenceMyst: Little Shop of Horrors, look for all things mysterious, from crime fiction, through thrillers and horror, to the craziest surrealism.
